name: Giovane Cesar Moreira Moura
content: Giovane C. M. Moura, Ph.D. Giovane C. M. Moura, Ph.D. Data Scientist @ SIDN Labs Assistant Professor @ TU Delft Cyber Security group E-mail: giovane at protonmail .ch Others: GitHub, Google Scholar, LinkedIn Biography ~ Recent Publications ~ Older Publications ~ Talks Short-bio: I am a Data Scientist with SIDN Labs, the research arm of SIDN, the Netherland’s .nl top-level domain operator. I am also an Assistant Professor at TU Delft’s CyberSecurity group. My research focus on bringing academic rigor to network operations, to improve performance, security and stability of networked systems. Recent publications (2016–now): Security Giovane C. M. Moura, Thomas Daniels, Maarten Bosteels, Sebastian Castro, Moritz Müller, Thymen Wabeke, Thijs van den Hout, Maciej Korczynski, and Georgios Smaragdakis. Characterizing and Mitigating Phishing Attacks at ccTLD Scale.
